thread.title: Real Madrid offer Isco six-year mega contract to kill Barcelona and Man City interest
thread.title_full: Real Madrid offer Isco six-year mega contract to kill Barcelona and Man City interest

title: Real Madrid offer Isco six-year mega contract to kill Barcelona and Man City interest
text:
1 of 25 Click to reveal every Real Madrid player's weekly wages 
Isco’s contract situation has dragged on since last summer and Real appeared uninterested in addressing the issue. 
But since the emergence of Barca’s interest the Bernabeu club have kicked into action. 
According to Spanish newspaper Marca , Real want Isco to pen a new contract next year, which will run until June 2024. GETTY Real Madrid want to give Isco (left) a new contract to block Barcelona's interest GETTY Manchester City are also supposedly interested in landing Isco GETTY Isco is currently away with Spain during the international break 
The playmaker will earn £5.2million a season from the deal, which equates to £17.1m AFTER tax over the duration of the contract. 
Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola is also said to be interested in Isco, who joined Real from Malaga in 2013. 
There were claims last summer that the player would be tempted by a loan move back to Malaga but no deal ever materialised. Related articles
